## R Markdown

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
data("iris")
```


```{r}
gg_plot = ggplot(data=iris,aes(x=Sepal.Width, y=Sepal.Length)) + geom_point() + theme_minimal()
```


```{r}
ggsave(
  "test.png",
  plot = gg_plot,
  device = NULL,
  path = NULL,
  scale = 1,
  width = NA,
  height = NA,
  units = c("in", "cm", "mm"),
  dpi = 350,
  limitsize = TRUE,
)
```

```{r}
veränderung <- "das ist eine Veränderung"
veränderung
```
